title: Andy Frisella Real AF On Life and Business
itunes:title: Andy Frisella Real AF On Life and Business
description:
Fact is, most business owners and entrepreneurs quit within a few years because they can't take the heat. Only a select few have figured out how to push forward, turn their weaknesses into superpowers and continue to level up decades down the line…
 
Andy Frisella is back to give us more hard-earned insight from his years spent building up crazy customer loyalty, setting the bar for entrepreneurs and teaching others how to do the same.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach and Andy dig into the strategy behind going all in (the smart way) and playing the long game, translating pain into radical growth in your own way, and the real problems messing up our country right now - the ones a lot of people don't want to see. Listen in for stone-cold facts from a man with decades behind him to back up the wisdom.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/real-af/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://www.podcastpenthouse.com/roadmaps/
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
